text: 26.41: Mt 6.13 naŋga, Ef 6.18 naŋga, Hi 2.14 naŋga, 4.15Narɨŋ mɨŋagaha vananda yɨvurahɨti mɨŋgata yɨvɨtɨrama. Kamataharɨm tamɨŋga naŋga kɨñɨŋgɨñɨ Got naŋga kuyundavaramara. Kandɨ, muhɨm vana andɨtɨrɨm pirɨkɨra. Hara narɨŋandɨ kwɨrandɨ haŋandɨhinɨndu tɨkatɨka maŋgɨyɨ, vami.Jisas ndu sɨmbɨrasara akwarɨhamu
